title: Dan Collins
description: Dan Collins is a developer from Upstate NY who is interested in programming and hardware challenges.

home.title: Hi! I'm Dan Collins
home.description: I am a software developer primarily interested in web technologies. I currently lead a team of technology professionals serving a promotional products company. This team is divided into two areas. One team is responsible for developing internal applications and public facing e-commerce websites. The other team handles the hardware and system maintenance used to power the daily operations of the company.
